name: PrestaShopAssistant
0:
”Alexa, open PrestaShop Assistant”
”Alexa, ask PrestaShop Assistant to register my web store”
”Alexa, ask PrestaShop Assistant how many orders I had today”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: presta shop assistant
des:
Get Reports about your PrestaShop Web Store using your favorite speaker. It only requires you to install our module called "Alexa Assistant" inside of your PrestaShop store.

Some included reports are:

- The number of customer(s) registered during a date period.
- The number of order(s) registered during a date period.
- Get a list of products with low stock quantities from your web store.

With all these functionalities being configurable inside of the PrestaShop module.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
